import React from 'react' import { NavLink } from 'react-router-dom' import post from "../data/blogs.json" const BlogDetails = ({}) => { return (
{post.title}

By {post.author} on {" "} {post.category}

Posted on {post.date}

{post.content}

{post.tags.map((tag, index) => ( {`#${tag}`} ))}
) } export default BlogDetails
